name: B. Braun Melsungen AG
goal: The overall goal of B. Braun is to manage a group of companies that operate in the following areas: development, manufacturing, sales, supply, installation and maintenance of all types of medical devices, systems and solutions, as well as research, development, manufacturing, sale and supply of pharmaceutical products.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
